title: Not A 911
description: When it comes to Porsche, the 911 often takes center stage. But for Patrick, a dedicated transaxle enthusiast, the 968 offered something the 911 couldn’t—a harmonious blend of performance and practicality. Patrick’s journey with the Porsche 968 began as a decision to seek out a car that fit his life better than the iconic 911. The 968, with its transaxle design, six-speed gearbox, and refined balance, struck the perfect chord for a car that could handle both spirited driving and daily errands. Continue...
